text:
[Verse]
Woke up this morning
Got a dream in my head
Eyes wide open
Chasing what you said

[Verse 2]
City lights glowing
Running through the night
Street signs showing
Future's looking bright

[Chorus]
Dreams come true
When you believe
Hold on tight
Just never leave

[Verse 3]
Waves keep crashing
On this endless ride
Hearts keep latching
To the dream inside

[Bridge]
Stars are shining
In the midnight sky
Keep on finding
Ways to fly high

[Chorus]
Dreams come true
When you believe
Hold on tight
Just never leave
title: Chasing Dreams
